title: Language Learning with Technology
subtitle: Helping Parents Guide Digital Language Learning in 2025
author: Dr. Charles Martin
description: A comprehensive guide for parents navigating the world of digital language learning in 2025. Drawing from doctoral research and real classroom experience, Dr. Charles Martin explains how to use AI tutors, mobile apps, and modern technology to help children become confident multilingual speakers. Practical, research-based, and updated for today's tools including ChatGPT, Duolingo, AR/VR immersion, and voice assistants. Perfect for parents of children ages 4-18 learning any language.
uniqueValue: Only book combining doctoral research with 2025 AI technology updates
